text: ql -ayha alrswl- lmshrky qwmk: akhbrwny 'iin kan hdha alquran min eind allah wakafartum bh, washahid shahid min bani 'iisrayiyl kebd allah bin salam ealaa mthl hdha alqran, wahu ma fi altawrat min altasdiq bnbwt muhamad salaa allah ealayh wslm, fsddaq waeamil bima ja' fi alqran, wjhdtm dhlk astkbarana, fahal hdha 'iilaa 'aezam alzulm wa'ashada alkfr? 'iina allah la ywffiq 'iilaa al'iislam wa'iisabat alhaqu alqawm aladhin zalamuu 'anfusahum bikufrihim ballh
